game.name: UnderMine
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: RPG가 가미된 액션 어드벤처 로그라이크 게임. 언더마인 깊은 곳을 탐험하고 강력한 유물, 치명적인 적, 숨겨진 비밀, 도움을 줄 친구들을 찾아보세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: An action-adventure roguelike with a bit of RPG tossed in. Adventure deep into the UnderMine and discover powerful relics, deadly enemies, hidden secrets, and a few friends to help along the way.
